statements: SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers WHERE loyalty_points > 100;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_purchase_amount < 500;
SELECT customer_id, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers WHERE loyalty_points > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 5000 AND loyalty_points < 2000 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_purchase_amount BETWEEN 1000 AND 3000 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points FROM high_value_customers WHERE loyalty_points > 500 ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, loyalty_points, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM HighValueCustomers;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM HighValueCustomers WHERE total_spent > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, last_purchase_date FROM HighValueCustomers ORDER BY last_purchase_date DESC;
SELECT promo_id, promo_name FROM SpecialPromotions WHERE valid_until > '2022-10-31';
SELECT promo_name, promo_discount FROM SpecialPromotions ORDER BY promo_discount DESC;
SELECT * FROM HighValueCustomers WHERE total_spent > 1000 AND last_purchase_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_name, total_spent FROM HighValueCustomers WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY total_spent ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_spent, last_purchase_date FROM HighValueCustomers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT promo_name, promo_discount, valid_until FROM SpecialPromotions WHERE promo_discount >= 10 AND valid_until < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM HighValueCustomers AS HVC JOIN SpecialPromotions AS SP ON HVC.total_spent >= SP.promo_discount * 100;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT promotion_name, discount_amount FROM promotions ORDER BY discount_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, total_purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers WHERE total_purchase_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT promotion_name, discount FROM promotions WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers JOIN transactions ON customers.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transactions.amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM promotions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY discount DESC;
SELECT * FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM high_value_customers WHERE joining_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM high_value_customers JOIN purchase_history ON high_value_customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id;
SELECT program_name, discount_rate FROM loyalty_programs WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotion_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM high_value_customers;
SELECT customer_name, joining_date FROM high_value_customers ORDER BY joining_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, email, COUNT(*) AS total_purchases FROM high_value_customers JOIN purchase_history ON high_value_customers.customer_id = purchase_history.customer_id GROUP BY customer_id, email;
SELECT * FROM purchase_history WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM high_value_customers JOIN customer_feedback ON high_value_customers.customer_id = customer_feedback.customer_id WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
